title: Restoring The Heavenly Palace
alternative_title: Zi Dingyi Tianting ; Customizing the Heavenly Court ; Self Defining Heaven ; Zì Dìngyì Tiāntíng ; 自定义天庭
status: Zi Dingyi Tianting ; Customizing the Heavenly Court ; Self Defining Heaven ; Zì Dìngyì Tiāntíng ; 自定义天庭
description:
Description :
        Restoring the Heavenly PalaceHe Xiu discovered that the Heavenly Palace, which he aspired to be a part of as an immortal, had been abandoned, only the lone phoenix demon g** was left with the shattered heavens.. He Xiu wanted to restore the skies to their previous power in order to become an everlasting Saint. Instead, he acquired the power of the Heavenly Guardian G** to possess with intent. So he become the next ruler of Heaven by accident!!?
